name: ADDNAG SOLUTIONS
tag_list: nag-screen, dynamic-content, iphone-nag-screen, android-nag-screen, mobile-nag, dynamic-data
overview:
AddNag provides a content sharing patform for startups, entrepreneurs.

AddNag is a free to use service for startups, entrepreneurs to help them built up there ideas. If you have any questions about AddNag or our services, please feel free to contact us.

The present support is to help you to display light content within application. We are in process to scale it up and make it easy to use for you. We will continue to make innovations and improvise the service while sticking to our goal of providing easy to use and economical platform for application developers.

When you use AddNag Services, we may request information, including your FirstName, LastName, Email and Password to create your Profile. We use such information to manage your account and to provide you with access to the AddNag Services.
